about_the_game:
Digital Extras content includes the MW5: Mercenaries Soundtrack consisting of 25 tracks & the Heroes of the Inner Sphere Soundtrack with 14  tracks. The Digital Extras content also includes a selection of hi-res artwork and renders for desktop & mobile and a 58-page Tech Manual outlining Mech stats.

Digital Content Breakdown

Sound Tracks
  • MechWarrior 5: Mercenaries Soundtrack - 25 tracks about 1.5 hours of music
  • Heroes of the Inner Sphere Soundtrack *updated for this release – 14 tracks about 1 hour of music
PDF
  • Tech Manual Technical Readouts for Select Mechs - 58 Pages with mech details *was not updated for the DLC

Art Work and Desktops Images Various resolutions
  • Concept art *updated for this release
  • Select Screenshots
  • Selected Marketing Images

To access your Digital Extras right-click the game in the library->Manage->Browse local files.

content_descriptors.notes: MechWarrior 5: Mercenaries contains vehicular combat violence and building destruction.
